TopicTitle: Voyage to Verviedi - A career with mods.

Articles.Content:
Log Summary:

Objectives:

1. Unlock enough of the Tech Tree to get the Warp Drive from KSP Interstellar

2. Send a probe to Abaddon

3. Create a permanent base on Verviedi

4. Explore the moons of Valdnes.

Mod List:

Verviedi Planet Pack - http://bit.ly/1eoi5Mh

KSP Interstellar - http://bit.ly/1mIyEXz

Let's do this.

Flight 1 - Flight of the Vergere

Preflight Log:

My objectives for this flight are to gain enough science to unlock the basic rocketry components. Therefore, this will be a mission procedure test. The rocket will not leave the ground.

The Vergere pattern capsule.

After the mission test, I gained 24 science.

Nodes Gained:

Basic Rocketry

Stability

Flight 2 - Space and Landing.

Preflight Log:

My objectives for this flight were simply to gather enough science to finish Tier 2 of the tech tree (and reach SPAAAAACE!)

Vergere 2 on the pad.

Launch. Actually very few stability problems. Turning was very good.

Spacewalk gave me about 20 science points.

Reentry.

The science points gained.

Nodes Gained:

General Rocketry

Survivability.

25 points left over.

Edited January 26, 2014 by Poryy
A word of advice, you can milk it even more if you walk off the terrain pads the buildings are on. that instantly changes you to the grassland biome for more science.

A word of advice, you can milk it even more if you walk off the terrain pads the buildings are on. that instantly changes you to the grassland biome for more science.

That makes it sound like I'm exploiting something. Thanks anyway.
